sentences.en: An impromptu cricket fight in one of the stalls.
sentences.cn: 一个摊位上正在进行的一场即兴蟋蟀大战。

sentences.en: But I lie quietly, listening to the cricket choirs outside. That remind me of childhood.
sentences.cn: 但我静静躺了下来，听着外面蟋蟀的合唱，让我回想起了童年时光。

sentences.en: By a curious twist of fate, cricket was also my favourite sport.
sentences.cn: 让人感到惊奇的是，板球碰巧也是我最喜欢的运动。

sentences.en: Cricket is so peculiarly English.
sentences.cn: 板球是颇具英国特色的运动。

sentences.en: Cricket is the archetypal English game.
sentences.cn: 板球是典型的英格兰运动。

sentences.en: Cricket: Blast for Ormrod.
sentences.cn: 板球：炮轰奥姆罗德。

sentences.en: Even in Zurich he kept up with the County cricket scores.
sentences.cn: 即使身在苏黎世，他也一直关注着郡际板球赛的比分。

sentences.en: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.cn: 比赛失败后，他生气地踏死了他的蟋蟀。

sentences.en: He felt he would never tire of international cricket.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己永远不会对国际板球赛生厌。

sentences.en: He officially announced his retirement from first-class cricket yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他昨天正式宣布退出甲级板球赛。

sentences.en: He was at his happiest whilst playing cricket.
sentences.cn: 玩板球时他最开心了。

sentences.en: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.cn: 他是被强拉去参加这场板球义赛的。

sentences.en: I enjoyed playing cricket.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢打板球。

sentences.en: In cricket, a no ball reckons as one run.
sentences.cn: 在板球中, 投球违例要失一分.

sentences.en: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用他的刀子换了一个板球棒。

sentences.en: the chirping of crickets
sentences.cn: 蟋蟀的唧唧叫声

sentences.en: The England cricket team scored quite a useful total.
sentences.cn: 英格兰板球队得分总数令人满意.

sentences.en: Their treatment of staff is definitely not cricket.
sentences.cn: 他们对待员工的方式绝对不公正。

sentences.en: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd.
sentences.cn: 板球比赛能激起观众热情的地方很少。

sentences.en: Waugh was a duffer at cricket.
sentences.cn: 沃的板球打得很臭。

sentences.en: Why should you spring my cricket bat?
sentences.cn: 你干吗非弄弯我的板球拍呢?。

sentences.en: You think Yorkshire is the best cricket side ? My foot!
sentences.cn: 你以为约克郡队是最好的队 吗 ?算了吧!

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)不公平的事；不公正的事；不光明正大的事

trans.tran_en: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks
